albums.title: Speaking In Tongues
albums.description: The fifth studio album by Talking Heads, it is also their highest charting album on the American Billboard 200

albums.title: Make It Big
albums.description: Certified 6x Platinum, the album has sold over 10 million copies worldwide.

albums.title: Skid Row
albums.description: Debut studio album from Skid Row produced 3 singles and brought the group nationwide popularity.
